article_title: Can Americans Be Weaned From Freebies Or Are We Doomed To Bankruptcy?

article_metadata.author: Jeffrey Dorfman

og.description: Americans--poor, rich, and middle class--are addicted to freebies with subsidies and handouts abounded all around us. Coming to expect all these free lunches exposes us and the country to a number of dangers.
og.title: Can Americans Be Weaned From Freebies Or Are We Doomed To Bankruptcy?
